LanguageData.UNAGIDDress.label: duster dress
LanguageData.UNAGIDDress.description: A dress-like garment.\n\nIt has the same performance as a duster.
LanguageData.UNAGIDcoat.label: duffle coat
LanguageData.UNAGIDcoat.description: A duffle coat.\n\nIt has the same performance as a duster.
LanguageData.UNAGIDsailor.label: sailor coat
LanguageData.UNAGIDsailor.description: A coat with a sailor collar.\n\nIt has the same performance as a duster.
LanguageData.UNAGIribbonshirt.label: ribbon shirt
LanguageData.UNAGIribbonshirt.description: A collared shirt with a ribbon.
